StellarSpectra documentation¶

StellarSpectra is designed to infer stellar properties such as effective temperature \(T_{\rm eff}\), surface gravity \(\log(g)\), and metallicity \([{\rm Fe}/{\rm H}]\) from high resolution spectra using a Bayesian model.

Contents:
